DOC.brief_summary: The Resilience Alliance skill-based staff development intervention child protective staff focus improve job satisfaction , resilience , optimism social support , decrease attrition , stress reactivity burnout . The investigator believe intervention enhance capacity child welfare worker care , result provide good care child family involve child welfare system . The Resiliance Alliance implement two child protective office , Manhattan Zone C Brooklyn Zone B . Staff two additional office ( Staten Island Zone A Brooklyn Zone C ) serve control group . A web-based survey administer group receive Resiliance Alliance intervention prior intervention , completion intervention , 3 month post completion . The control group give two-part training ( 3 hour total ) secondary traumatic stress . The control group ask complete survey intervention group .
